name: DEAD END 3 DEMO
description:
DEAD END is a game that I made in 2011,

it was actually the first full game I made. 

In 2012 I did a remake of that game that I call'd 
DEAD END 2 but now in 2018 I am making DEAD END 3 
and it will be SICK and also the last remake of this game I'll ever do. 


DEAD END is a Mutant/Zombie game where you have 3 weapons 
but at different locations, Barret 50 Cal, L96A1 
and Dragunov. Your Mission is to get throught the 
City killing and then get to the Rescue Helicopter.

Weapon Skins/Unlocks and Easter Eggs WILL be in the game!


This game is right now in Demo state and the full version will be released when the campain is fully complete! After that I'm going to keep updating some more stuff until I feel it's 100% Done! :)

Thanks to all that have supported this Game Project 

means alot and I hope you Enjoy this Demo! :D

Follow and Support my Projects at:

www.Rednap.net

Peace out!

//Rednap
